Desc.entry: The largest and longest established children's film festival in England. The festival runs in June and July and offers 15 days of films, workshops and competitions for young film fans and is a unique arts and educational resource for South Yorkshire. Aims to present a diverse programme of films and shorts that are made both for and by young people from all around the world, addressing issues that are relevant to children and young people today. Showcomotion is also host to the Children's Media Conference, the only conference in the UK dedicated to children's television, film, radio and interactive media.
